price: Know that Allah revives the earth after its death[14]. We have made the signs clear to you so that you may understand.
arabic: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحۡيِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ قَدۡ بَيَّنَّا لَكُمُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
footnotes: [14] Similarly, it is easy for Allah to soften the hearts and guide after misguidance.
